title: #63: The Death Penalty???
description:
In this Special Edition Real Crime Profile call to action episode, Jim Clemente interviews James Clark, Amnesty International Senior Death Penalty Abolition Campaigner about the new Global Report on Executions released today and the pending execution of 8 men in Arkansas scheduled for the next week.

New to Real Crime Profile? Never miss an episode by subscribing today at smarturl.it/realcrime

Sign the petition to stop the execution of 8 people in 10 days in Arkansas here: http://bit.ly/2ok3ja6
